mapper.select:
select a.*,b.color from `wk_oa_event` a left join `wk_oa_calendar_type` b on a.type_id = b.type_id where 1 = 1
and find_in_set(#{queryEventListBO.userId},owner_user_ids)
and (repeat_end_time is null or case when repetition_type = 1 then unix_timestamp(repeat_start_time) * 1000 >= (#{queryEventListBO.startTime} - (unix_timestamp(end_time) * 1000 - unix_timestamp(start_time) * 1000)) and unix_timestamp(repeat_end_time) * 1000 <= #{queryEventListBO.endTime} + (unix_timestamp(end_time) * 1000 - unix_timestamp(start_time) * 1000) else unix_timestamp(repeat_end_time)*1000 >= #{queryEventListBO.startTime} end )
and a.type_id in
#{typeId}
